favourite.article: Very nice music. This a very nice song to sing. God has sent this song for us. Thank You Lord for giving such a beautiful song. This song is all about shining. Listening to this song I felt that you are sitting next to me and singing this song. Thank You Lord.

Oh! this beautiful hymn that my dad sang to me when I was a small child if I woke up in the night. I am 68yrs old now and I have sung it to my grandchildren when they were small. May Our Lord bless each and every one of you, and may this hymn never be lost to time.

I was asked to share the word this coming Sunday at the children's church the 9th March 2014. I wanted the little ones to shine like a candle as Jesus wanted us to be. So, I wanted them to sing this song. Thank you so much. May the Good LORD bless You!

I love this song! When I was seven years old I lived in Taichung, Taiwan. There were three missionaries from England who loved me and shepherded me. They wanted me to sing this song in a meeting. I can never forget those glorious time with them! Amen! let us all shine out Christ like a little burning in the night!
I really love this. I teach this to the children's meeting and they love this song also. Thank You Lord for placing us in Your green pasture.
This song is really interesting for all the children.
Thanks! I am teaching this song in French to my pupils and needed the tune. God bless.
This is a good song. The chinese equivalent is 1101 in the children's song book printed by Taiwan Gospel Bookroom.
I just love this hymn, no way can you be sad when singing or listening to it.
